gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 125, Rockets 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks win their seventh game in a row to improve to 45-29 on the year as they snap Houston’s 11-game win streak, defeating them 125-107. Luka Doncic totaled 47 points (32 in first half), nine 3PM, 12 rebounds, and seven assists as Kyrie Irving added 24 points and seven assists for Dallas, who made a season-high 24 3PT FGs in the game. Houston was led by Jabari Smith Jr.’s 28 points, five 3PM and seven rebounds. Houston moves to 38-36 on the year.
